description: NOT OFFERED IN 2010. This course is designed to introduce students to some key debates in contemporary political studies scholarship. The skills of critical analysis will be taught and applied to a wide range of recently published material in fields such as political power, democracy, the changing role of the state, equity and justice, gender politics, political economy, etc. The course is taught in a participatory manner providing students with skills required for policy-related work and academic studies.
restricted: Restricted to students enrolled in the BA(Hons) and BSocSc(Hons) programs
